dc_title_s: 1930 Real Estate Plat-Book of the City of Trenton and Borough of Princeton, Mercer County, New Jersey (Plate 48 or 48, Trenton)
dc_description_s: In addition to the title page, the 1930 Plat-Book contains three indices and 48 detailed map plates of the city of Trenton, and 6 detailed map plates and one page containing three indices for the borough of Princeton. |Plate 48 of the 1930 Real Estate Plat-Book, includes part of Trenton's Ward 8. The map scale for this plate is 1" = 150'.
